**Echoes of Eternity**: A time-traveling drama that follows a group of strangers brought together by a mysterious entity to prevent a catastrophic event from occurring in the past. Each character has a unique skillset and a personal connection to the event, forcing them to navigate their complicated pasts and work together to alter the course of history. As they jump through time, they must confront the consequences of their actions and the echoes of their past selves.

**The Memory Keepers**: A supernatural mystery series that delves into the world of memories and the people who collect, trade, and manipulate them. Protagonist Maya, a gifted memory keeper, discovers a hidden world where memories are currency, and those who control them hold the power. As she navigates this treacherous landscape, she must confront her own dark past and the secrets that have been hidden within her memories.

**The Last Refuge**: A post-apocalyptic thriller that takes place in a world where a deadly virus has ravaged the planet, leaving only a few isolated communities intact. The story follows a group of survivors as they navigate the treacherous landscape, searching for a fabled safe haven known as "The Refuge." Along the way, they must confront the moral dilemmas of their new world and the secrets that threaten to tear their community apart.

**The Shadow Weaver**: A fantasy drama that explores the world of magic and mythology through the eyes of a young weaver named Aria. Aria discovers she has the ability to weave magic into fabric, creating powerful artifacts that can manipulate reality. As she delves deeper into the world of magic, she must confront the dark forces that seek to exploit her abilities and the secrets of her own past.

**The Department of Lost Things**: A surreal comedy-drama that follows a group of bureaucratic agents working for a mysterious government agency tasked with retrieving lost objects from the vast expanse of the multiverse. Each episode features a new case, as the agents navigate the absurdities of the multiverse and confront the existential crises of their own lives. Along the way, they must confront the nature of reality and the true purpose of their department.
